CustomField.formula: IF( AND ( $Profile.Id ='00eA0000000hNqj' ||$Profile.Id ='00e30000000nJ6K' , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Pending') ) , HYPERLINK( '/apex/RRAutoApprovePage?id=' & Id , IMAGE( "/resource/1298546011000/ApproveRebateRule", 'Approve Rebate Rule'),'_parent') , ' None')
CustomField.label: Available Action
